Device is sold in various places, [http://www.geeks.com/details.asp?InvtId=WL0183&cpc=RESX Geeks.com] among them. 17 dBm typical transmit power Receive sensitivty
150M: -68 dBm@10% PER
130M: -68 dBm@10% PER
108M: -68 dBm@10% PER
54M: -68 dBm@10% PER
11M: -85 dBm@8% PER
6M: -88 dBm@10% PER
1M: -90 dBm@8% PER [[Category:English Documentation]]
